mapper.sql: ordersid, ordercode, usersid, carsid, turnback, pay, thestart, theend, place, address, addtime, status, money
mapper.insert: insert into orders (ordersid, ordercode, usersid, carsid, thestart, theend, place, address, addtime, status, money,turnback,pay) values (#{ordersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thestart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '-1', #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-1','-1')

insert into orders
ordersid,
ordercode,
usersid,
carsid,
thestart,
theend,
place,
address,
addtime,
status,
money,
turnback,
pay,

mapper.update:
update orders
ordercode = #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usersid = #{usersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carsid = #{carsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thestart = #{thestart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
theend = #{theend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ordersid = #{ordersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders set ordercode = #{ordercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usersid = #{usersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carsid = #{carsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thestart = #{thestart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, theend = #{theend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ordersid = #{ordersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select os.*,us.username,us.realname,us.contact, cs.carno,cs.price from orders os left join users us on os.usersid=us.usersid left join cars cs on os.carsid=cs.carsid limit #{offset},#{limit}

select os.*,us.username,us.realname,us.contact,us.sex,us.idcard,us.address2, cs.carno,cs.price,cs.image,cs.displacement from orders os left join users us on os.usersid=us.usersid left join cars cs on os.carsid=cs.carsid where os.ordersid=#{ordersid}

select os.*,us.username,us.realname,us.contact,us.sex,us.idcard,us.address2, cs.carno,cs.price,cs.image,cs.displacement from orders os left join users us on os.usersid=us.usersid left join cars cs on os.carsid=cs.carsid where os.usersid=#{usersid} and os.status='-1' limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( select os.*,us.username,us.realname,us.contact,us.sex,us.idcard,us.address2, cs.carno,cs.price,cs.image,cs.displacement from orders os left join users us on os.usersid=us.usersid left join cars cs on os.carsid=cs.carsid where os.usersid=#{usersid} and os.status='-1' ) ss

select os.*,us.username,us.realname,us.contact,us.sex,us.idcard,us.address2, cs.carno,cs.price,cs.image,cs.displacement from orders os left join users us on os.usersid=us.usersid left join cars cs on os.carsid=cs.carsid where os.usersid=#{usersid} and os.status='1' limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( select os.*,us.username,us.realname,us.contact,us.sex,us.idcard,us.address2, cs.carno,cs.price,cs.image,cs.displacement from orders os left join users us on os.usersid=us.usersid left join cars cs on os.carsid=cs.carsid where os.usersid=#{usersid} and os.status='1' ) ss
mapper.update: update orders set turnback ='1' where ordersid=#{ordersid}
update orders set theend =#{theend} where ordersid=#{ordersid}
